# Number Prefix Test

This tests that wiki links to files with number prefixes resolve correctly.

## Space-Dash-Space Prefixes (Obsidian Kanban style)

- [[tasks/6 - Sign Up for Ramp|Sign Up]]
- [[tasks/1 - Bamboo Onboarding|Onboarding]]
- [[tasks/10 - New Hire Tasks|Tasks]]

## Dash Prefixes

- [[tasks/01-dashboard|Dashboard]]

## Space Prefixes (ordering)

- [[tasks/02 introduction|Introduction]]

## Years (should NOT strip)

- [[tasks/2023 Goals|Goals for 2023]]
- [[tasks/1999 Report|Report from 1999]]

## Dot Prefixes (folder style)

- [[tasks/0. Inbox|Inbox]]
